pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mixtures of Power Exponential and Skew Power Exponential Distributions for Use in Model-Based Clustering and Classification // Mixtures of skewed and elliptical distributions are implemented using mixtures of multivariate skew power exponential and power exponential distributions, respectively. A generalized expectation-maximization framework is used for parameter estimation. Methodology for mixtures of power exponential distributions is from Dang et al. (2015) doi: 10.1111/biom.12351.
